name: @giraphql/schema-builder-root
description: A strongly typed code first schema builder for GraphQL

scripts.prepare: husky install && beemo create-config && beemo typescript:sync-project-refs
scripts.ci: yarn run type && yarn run test && yarn run lint
scripts.prerelease: yarn run ci && yarn run build
scripts.release: lerna version --conventional-commits --conventional-graduate --changelog-preset conventional-changelog-beemo --create-release github --push && lerna publish from-git
scripts.preview: yarn prerelease && lerna version --conventional-commits --conventional-prerelease --changelog-preset conventional-changelog-beemo --push && lerna publish from-git

author: Michael Hayes
